featured.text: The headgear was later made mandatory at construction sites in major construction projects, such as the Hoover Dam in 1931 and the Golden Gate Bridge in 1933.

definition.zh_def: 吸塵器，一種用於清潔地面和其他表面的電動設備。
definition.en_def: A vacuum cleaner, an electric device used for cleaning floors and other surfaces.
definition.example: I need to hoover the living room before our guests arrive.
